title: Update Failed:Unspecified error occurred, Please check the logs for more information
body:
Error started occurring out of nowhere, so of course I submitted a support ticket but we didn't really get very far. I have re-installed the client more times than I can count. I open the launcher and it says 1 file scanning and then I get the error. Changing my dns to a public dns hasn't solved anything and neither has forcing a re-patch. Am in need of some fresh Idea's. Here are the logs

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please put your latest patcher and launcher logs on [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for me and reply with a link to them if this issue isn't already resolved?
